oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - No. 4957
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show No. 4957, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold, the Oklahoma Wranglers, Roy Wiggins, and host Vince Harding. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'. Earliest possible record date is 1949, possibly early 1950s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Oklahoma Wranglers; Roy Wiggins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Vince Harding) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Whose Heart Are You Breaking Now? (Eddy Arnold) -- River Stay Away From My Door (Eddy Arnold) -- Vince Harding introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Sing Me A Song Of The Saddle (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- You'll Be Sorry (Roy Wiggins steel guitar) -- Vince Harding and Eddy Arnold talk -- That Wonderful Mother Of Mine (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Wiggins, Roy; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis, Guy, 1915-1981; Willis, Skeeter, -1976; Willis, Vic, -1995; Wright, Chuck
